name: Hamtaro: Rainbow Rescue
description:
Lots of mini-games in a cute world filled with talking hamsters, each with their own specialities.

Prince Bo fell off his rainbow and he needs help to return to Rainbow Land. Cue Hamtaro and his friends, who have to gather the seven colors of the rainbow to rebuild it. By winning the mini-games you earn stickers and pictures which can be used to fill a virtual stickerbook but can also be traded with friends with a GameBoy Link Cable.
developedBy: AlphaDream Corporation, Ltd., Graphic Research Co., Ltd.

releases.country: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, The Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom

shot.caption: Bijou was admiring a rainbow and decides to go tell her friends about it
As Bijou and her friends check out the rainbow...it suddenly disappear! And the strange hamster that was on it falls down.
Seems like the weird hamster has fallen on "The Boss", knocking him unconscious and also knocked away the log that acted as a bridge.
Seems the log is too heavy for two Ham-Hams
After finding Bijou, grab the log and bring over to the edge.
A little dance for completing a task
At the Ham-Ham's home, Prince Bo explains that he's from Rainbow land.
Prince Bo took out his umbrella to travel back to his home but discovers it was broken.

The Ham-Hams decides to help Prince Bo.  Prince Bo explains he will need 7 ingredients with 7 unique colors to fix his umbrella and they all set off to find items that bear one of the 7 unique colors.
